an5.143:1.1: Ekam samayam bhagava vesaliyam viharati mahavane kutagarasalayam.
an5.143:1.2: Atha kho bhagava pubbanhasamayam nivasetva pattacivaramadaya vesalim pindaya pavisi.
an5.143:1.3: Tena kho pana samayena pancamattanam licchavisatanam sarandade cetiye sannisinnanam sannipatitanam ayamantarakatha udapadi:
an5.143:1.6: Hatthiratanassa patubhavo dullabho lokasmim, assaratanassa patubhavo dullabho lokasmim, maniratanassa patubhavo dullabho lokasmim, itthiratanassa patubhavo dullabho lokasmim, gahapatiratanassa patubhavo dullabho lokasmim.
an5.143:1.7: Imesam pancannam ratananam patubhavo dullabho lokasmin”ti.
an5.143:2.1: Atha kho te licchavi magge purisam thapesum:
an5.143:2.2: “yada tvam, ambho purisa, passeyyasi bhagavantam, atha amhakam aroceyyasi”ti.
an5.143:2.3: Addasa kho so puriso bhagavantam duratova agacchantam;
an5.143:2.4: disvana yena te licchavi tenupasankami; upasankamitva te licchavi etadavoca:
an5.143:2.5: “ayam so, bhante, bhagava gacchati araham sammasambuddho;
an5.143:3.1: Atha kho te licchavi yena bhagava tenupasankamimsu; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam atthamsu. Ekamantam thita kho te licchavi bhagavantam etadavocum:
an5.143:4.1: “Sadhu, bhante, yena sarandadam cetiyam tenupasankamatu anukampam upadaya”ti.
an5.143:4.3: Atha kho bhagava yena sarandadam cetiyam tenupasankami; upasankamitva pannatte asane nisidi. Nisajja kho bhagava te licchavi etadavoca:
an5.143:4.4: “kaya nuttha, licchavi, etarahi kathaya sannisinna, ka ca pana vo antarakatha vippakata”ti?
an5.143:4.5: “Idha, bhante, amhakam sannisinnanam sannipatitanam ayamantarakatha udapadi:
an5.143:4.8: Hatthiratanassa patubhavo dullabho lokasmim, assaratanassa patubhavo dullabho lokasmim, maniratanassa patubhavo dullabho lokasmim, itthiratanassa patubhavo dullabho lokasmim, gahapatiratanassa patubhavo dullabho lokasmim.
an5.143:4.9: Imesam pancannam ratananam patubhavo dullabho lokasmin’”ti.
an5.143:5.1: “Kamadhimuttanam vata bho licchavinam kamamyeva arabbha antarakatha udapadi.
an5.143:5.2: Pancannam, licchavi, ratananam patubhavo dullabho lokasmim.
an5.143:5.4: Tathagatassa arahato sammasambuddhassa patubhavo dullabho lokasmim,
an5.143:5.5: tathagatappaveditassa dhammavinayassa deseta puggalo dullabho lokasmim,
an5.143:5.6: tathagatappaveditassa dhammavinayassa desitassa vinnata puggalo dullabho lokasmim,
an5.143:5.7: tathagatappaveditassa dhammavinayassa desitassa vinnata dhammanudhammappatipanno puggalo dullabho lokasmim,
an5.143:5.9: Imesam kho, licchavi, pancannam ratananam patubhavo dullabho lokasmin”ti.
